![](2025-images/SRCD-Minneapolis.png){width="75%" fig-align="center"}

The annual meeting of the Society for Research in Child Development was held in Minneapolis. Hailey Rousey presented a talk, "Skill acquisition vs. skill expression: Relating infants’ motor development and daily language input". Her talk was part of a symposium, "Early sensorimotor experiences in infant’s language development in diverse contexts using mixed methods", organized by Drs. Minxuan He and Eric Walle.

![](2025-images/Hailey-SRCD.jpg){width="100%" fig-align="center"}

Yushan Guo presented a poster, "Characterizing Infant Everyday Postural Experiences through Repeated Video Sampling."

![](2025-images/Yushan-SRCD.jpg){width="100%" fig-align="center"}
